title: Student
description: A person who is engaged in education. Generally depicted wearing a black graduation gown and cap, and occasionally holding a degree certificate or diploma.
apple_vendor_description: As rendered on Apple devices, the student emoji embodies academic pursuit with a friendly, approachable persona. This character is depicted with smooth, rounded features and realistic lighting, often holding books or a backpack, suggesting a journey of learning. The subtle 3D shading gives the figure a sense of presence, making it a warm and relatable symbol for education, study, and the pursuit of knowledge within Apple‚Äôs design language.
